title: Randomly get high ping and random short disconnects in game
body: It's been like this for the last month but now it has gotten even worse

replies.body: Oh no!  It seems like you had an unstable connection that's been continuously degrading up to this point.  We can reverse this, though!  Run through the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network, but definitely test it in a custom game to make sure everything is okay.
